description: Gets information about a Fleet Hub for IoT Device Management web application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The unique Id of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationId
nested_items.description: The unique Id of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationName
nested_items.description: The name of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationDescription
nested_items.description: An optional description of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationState
nested_items.description: The current state of the web application.

nested_items.name: applicationCreationDate
nested_items.description: The date (in Unix epoch time) when the application was created.

nested_items.name: applicationLastUpdateDate
nested_items.description: The date (in Unix epoch time) when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role that the web application assumes when it interacts with Amazon Web Services IoT Core.

nested_items.name: ssoClientId
nested_items.description: The Id of the single sign-on client that you use to authenticate and authorize users on the web application.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A message that explains any failures included in the applicationState response field. This message explains failures in the CreateApplication and DeleteApplication actions.
